TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NotificationListenerService extends Android.App.Service
Public MustInherit Class NotificationListenerService Inherits Service
public ref class NotificationListenerService abstract : Android::App::Service

Docs.summary: A service that receives calls from the system when new notifications are posted or removed, or their ranking changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MigrateNotificationFilter (int defaultTypes, System.Collections.Generic.IList<string>? disallowedPkgs);
.method public hidebysig instance void MigrateNotificationFilter(int32 defaultTypes, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> disallowedPkgs) cil managed
Public Sub MigrateNotificationFilter (defaultTypes As Integer, disallowedPkgs As IList(Of String))

Docs.param: A value representing the types of notifications that this listener should receive by default

A list of package names whose notifications should not be seen by this listener, by default, because the listener does not process or display them, or because a user had previously disallowed these packages in the listener app's UI
Docs.summary: Lets an app migrate notification filters from its app into the OS.

Docs.summary: Inform the notification manager about snoozing a specific notification.
